itemLabel: Nicholas Fairfax, 14th Lord Fairfax of Cameron

wikipedia_page.main: Nicholas John Albert Fairfax, 14th Lord Fairfax of Cameron (born 4 January 1956), is a British nobleman, peer, and politician. He is the current (as of 2015) holder of the title of Lord Fairfax of Cameron, succeeding his father, Thomas Fairfax, 13th Lord Fairfax of Cameron.

link_mentions.page: List of barons in the peerages of Britain and Ireland
Terence Hamilton-Temple-Blackwood, 2nd Marquess of Dufferin and Ava
response: Through his eldest daughter, he was the grandfather of Hermione Hamilton Gunston (b. 1923), who married Lt. Col. Sir Walter Luttrell MC, and Sonia Helen Gunston JP (b. 1926), appointed Temporary Lady of the Bedchamber to Queen Elizabeth II in 1967, and who married Thomas Fairfax, 13th Lord Fairfax of Cameron (d.1964) and had issue including Nicholas Fairfax, 14th Lord Fairfax of Cameron (b. 1956).

response: |Nicholas Fairfax, 14th Lord Fairfax of Cameron(left the house in 1999)
